info.title: [Local] eHome PM API
info.description: eHome PM Process BackEnd API documentation

get.summary: Gets ethernet connection and wifi connection state, state - 100 means connected
Returns all wifis in range list

post.summary: accepts the password and the ssid of device which we would like to connect to
disconnects the wifi

get.summary: gets the hostname of cetral unit

post.summary: sets the new hostname
sets the timezone
turns on/off the time synchronization with server
sets the timestamp
sets the time in rfc3339 format

delete.summary: deletes downloaded central unit software update

Forbidden Error.description: Returned when update process is not idle.

post.summary: run process which will check whether is update and download file if available
run process which will check whether is update
run process which will check whether is usb update
runs central unit software update

get.summary: returns list of backups you can find on cenral unit

400.description: Filesystem error or Invalid object ID.

post.summary: Upload backup file

delete.summary: deletes backup, REQUIRES SAME BODY AS /settings/load-backup but oas3 does not allow to pass request body to delete http method

400.description: Filesystem error or Invalid object ID.

500.description: Unknown error or File not found

post.summary: creates backup with save of current settings

400.description: Filesystem error or Invalid object ID.

post.summary: loads backup you choose

500.description: Unknown error, Bad uid or Failed to extract file

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of backup file to download

post.summary: Import backup file from other device, will not restore users. Deletes statistics. New automatic backup is created immediately after import.

requestBody.description:
LedSettings model.
**NOTE:** Partial update is possible by sending single member of object, then rest of values remain unmodified.

get.summary: Gets a list of information about each block device.
Gets information about a desired block device.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the block device.

get.summary: Gets information about the state of formatter.

id.description: unique numeric ID of a device that is/was currently/previously formatted, equals 0 before the first formatting

post.summary: Starts formatting process of a desired block device.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the block device.

500.description: Unknown error or Formatting already in progress.

get.summary: Gets information about the currently activated influx device and the partition on which the influx database is stored.

device_identifier.description: hardware identifier of the active influx device

device_name.description: name of the active influx device

partition_number.description: number of the partition on which the influx database is stored

post.summary: Selects the influx active device and the partition on which we want to store the influx database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the block device on which we want to store the Influx database.

parameters.name: partno
parameters.description: Number of the device's partition on which we want to store the Influx database.

requestBody.description:
InfluxBackupSettings model.
**NOTE:** Partial update is possible by sending single member of object, then rest of values remain unmodified.

post.summary: Load influx backup. Can only load backups stored on removable device connected to central unit.

204.description: Success. Import task started wait for `influx_backup_loaded` event for success or `influx_backup_error` for failure.

post.summary: Import influx backup from other device.

204.description: Success. Import task started wait for `influx_backup_imported` event for success or `influx_backup_error` for failure.

get.summary: Returns cloud registration url (connecting eHome with cloud)
Returns cloud registration url (connecting eHome with cloud)

requestBody.description:
LogSettings model.
**NOTE:** Partial update is possible by sending single member of object, then rest of values remain unmodified.

get.summary: Get info if log streaming via websocket channel is enabled or not.

requestBody.description:
Live settings model.
**NOTE:** Partial update is not possible here!

post.summary: Starts system reboot process.
Starts system shutdown process.

requestBody.description:
System Resources settings.
*NOTE:* Parameter `enabled` is required in every request. Parameter `interval` is optional. Defaults to 5 seconds if not passed.

post.summary: Central device visual identification - blinks all LEDs.

description.example: Hey, I am creating backup with description

timestamp.description: a date of a backup creation in epoch time

backup_cycle.description: Number of days automatic cyclic backup is to be created. 0 means automatic cyclic backup is turned off.

version.description: Version that the changes apply to.

boot_a_left.description: Number of attemps left to start system A

boot_b_left.description: Number of attemps left to start system B

downloaded.description: Field with information about downloaded software update.

is_update.description: Field which show whether is software update downloaded.

new_version.description: Indicates if downloaded software version is different than current software version.

changelog.description: Array with information about changes from current software version to downloaded software version.

percent.description: Download or update percent of software update. (Based on `update_state` value)

new_version_available.description: Indicates if there is new version available online.

time.description: epoch time timestamp in local time

ntp_enable.description: pass true to set server time synchronization on else false

timezone.description: a timezone have to be an tz item from the /settings/time/timezones-list request

offset.description: time offset in minutes to UTC 00:00 eg. 60 = 1hour offset, -60 = -1hour offset

ntp_enable.description: shows whether synchronization server is enabled

ntp_synchronized.description: shows whether time is synchronized with server (time can be synchronized even if sync server is off)

ssid.description: Wifi we would like to connect

psk.description: if wifi is secured we should pass password to this field

security.description: shows whether wifi connection is secured (no matter which algoritm)

device_name.description: connected device's name (vendor+model in case of USB devices)

enabled.description: Status of system resources monitoring task.

interval.description: System resources information dispatching interval in seconds.

text.description: Text in english from translations database

Response.ValidationError.description: Encountered error during validating request data. Validation rules described on WikiDocs

errors.description: Dynamic hash map of validation errors with actual parameter name which failed validation

text.description: Text in english from translations database

params.description: Parameters which should be used in "text" instead of {} variables if there are any.

Response.GoGatewayError.description: Encountered error during request processing or sending through GO gateway.

Response.NotModified.description: Returned when user tried to update object supplying same data as current values.

Response.RequestParseError.description: Returned when e-home-main process received invalid Json Request structure.

Response.GoRequestParseError.description: Returned when e-home-go process failed to parse incoming json request.

Response.EmptyDataError.description: Returned when request requires content but user didn`t supply data.

Response.InvalidObjectIdSupplied.description: Returned when request url contains invalid object id (eg. non integer or out of int64 range).

Response.Unauthorized.description: Returned when authorization token (header) is invalid or expired.

Response.RouteNotFound.description: Returned when route is not implemented.

Response.ObjectNotFound.description: Returned when specific object was not found.

Response.MethodNotAllowed.description: Returned when route method is not implemented.

Response.RequestTimeout.description: Returned when request timeout happened. eg. e-home-main process works incorrectly or processing took more than 1 second.

Response.ValidationFailed.description: Returned when request contains invalid data.

my_string_param.text: Parameter should not contain special characters

Response.ObjectAllocationError.description: Returned when server failed to allocate object.

Response.Formatting.description: Returned when formatter is busy - i.e. formatting of any device is in progress

Response.UnknownError.description: Returned when unknown error happended. As always, this shouldn`t happen, but we all know it will happen :-)
